name: DHP_Green_Orfino_Velour_Futon
reviews: Pros: nice dark green color. Looks very close to the picture on the website.Cons: smaller than advertised on the website. Actual dimensions 15 x 68 x 38. The back of the futon is quite wobbly. The middle of the futon where the moving parts connect doesn't have enough cushion which makes it hard as rock there.When I purchased this futon its sleeping dimensions were advertised as 15 inches high x 70 inches wide x 43 inches deep.When I received it, I noticed that it was smaller. The actual sleeping dimensions for this futon are 15 inches high x 68 inches wide x 38 inches deep.
description: The soft velour fabric, classic diamond tufted design and wood scroll legs provide both high fashion and comfort. The DHP Orfino Futon can be quickly transformed from sofa to sleeper to lounger, making it a must have in any home.Classic wood scroll legsMid-century modern designSoft velour fabricDiamond tufted cushion designSimple assemblyWeight limit is 600 poundsSet includes: One (1) futonMaterials: Wood, microfiber, foamFinish: MicrofiberUpholstery color: GreenUpholstery fill: FoamShips in one (1) cartonWeight: 57.5 poundsSeat dimensions: 18 inches high x 70 inches wide x 25 inches deepSleeping dimensions: 15 inches high x 70 inches wide x 43 inches deepOverall dimensions: 29 inches high x 70 inches wide x 32 inches deepFurniture Pattern: SolidFurniture Room: Living Room, Bedroom, OfficeType: Sleeper Sofa, SofaMaterial: Wood, Foam, MicrofiberStyle: Modern, Transitional, ContemporaryAssembly: Assembly RequiredThickness: 7 InchExact Color: GreenSize: FullColor: GreenStyleContemporary, Modern, TransitionalMaterialFoam, Microfiber, WoodTypeSleeper Sofa, SofaThickness7 InchAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGreenFurniture PatternSolid
